data.title: King Faisal II and Prince Abdul-Ilah pictured with Iraqi students
data.meta_description: His Majesty King Faisal II Al-Hashimi of Iraq and his Royal Highness Prince Abdul-Ilah, Regent of Iraq, entertain forty Iraqi students attending schools in the United States under the International Educational Exchange Service. Prince Abdul-Ilah is pictured in the front row on the left and King Faisal II is three people to his right. From photograph album, "Visit of his Majesty the King of Iraq and his Royal Highness the Regent of Iraq to the United States of America, August 12 to September 8, 1952."

Description

His Majesty King Faisal II Al-Hashimi of Iraq and his Royal Highness Prince Abdul-Ilah, Regent of Iraq, entertain forty Iraqi students attending schools in the United States under the International Educational Exchange Service. Prince Abdul-Ilah is pictured in the front row on the left and King Faisal II is three people to his right. From photograph album, "Visit of his Majesty the King of Iraq and his Royal Highness the Regent of Iraq to the United States of America, August 12 to September 8, 1952."
